# Urban Centers Section

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-9300 TTY 711

__

urban.centers@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Parkway, Suite 755  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Suzie Battista  
Section Director

# Urban Centers Section

## Mission

To shape the Tysons Urban Center and Reston Transit Station Areas (TSAs) through urban design and land use plan implementation and monitoring.

## What We Do

The Urban Centers Section focuses on urban design, Plan implementation, Plan monitoring, and development review primarily in areas located around the Tysons and Reston Silverline Metro stations. We strive to create equitable places through community collaboration and inter-agency coordination.

metadata.title: Urban Centers Section | Planning Development
metadata.description: Fairfax County, Virginia - The Urban Centers Section conducts land use planning, zoning review, urban design and plan implementation in the emerging Transit Oriented Development areas located around Silverline Metro stations in Tysons and Reston.
